content: Hello,I have recently got bunch of prepaid mastercard gift cards loaded with $7.5 in each and looking to sell them for $5.99 BTC, ETH, LTC.We can deal over the forum or you can purchase them from my auto delivery shop:https://shoppy.gg/product/ufCD2W9I am gonna offer 3x free vouches for the first 3 members ask for them on this post.Edit: We can trade only over the PM since shoppy is broken.
